title: Midori no Makibao (Green Makibao)
synopsis: Midori Makibao is a small white racehorse. Compared to other thoroughbred horses, he looks more like a donkey with wide nostrils; however, with his guts and speed as his weapon, Makibao wins in every big race.
related_anime: ['Midori no Makibao Compilation OVA', 'Midori no Makibao']
